Great build for Apple Boot Camp. To install on a Mac, you need to get into XP's Recovery Console with a F10 during the CD's boot and then enter "FORMAT C: /FS:NTFS". Download and add BootChamp for Mac and you're ready to go!

Hi Maherz,

I downloaded this torrent hoping to fix my pc problems but it's not working.

After it loads up the necessary drivers and whatnot, right when the Windows Installer is about to launch I get a blue screen with the error:

"STOP: c0000221 Unknown Hard Error
\systemRoot\System32\ntdll.dll"

after which I need to restart the pc.

Please note I tried installing from my old Windows CD (it doesn't have the updates and I can't have it turned on because it's not cracked) and this one allows the execution of the Win Installer without any prob.

Any cahnce you can help me with that? perhaps it's something you put in the installation that's messing with that particular .dll?

Ty in advance!
hi. anyone can help. tryin to use this as an upgrade. but keygen shown earlier here doesnt work on pc. any ideas. many thanks.

@Maherz: I did it the first time with minimum writing speed on a quality CD; I also troubleshooted everything hardware related like cables/ HDD/ CD-Rom and couldn't find anything wrong - I replaced the .dll in question and it still didn't work.

After all that I thought I should give your earlier WinXP release a go and it worked beautifully.

Updates are working without a problem and the software is clean and safe.

Thank you!

One more thing though - regarding your WinRAR torrent - how do you apply the key to the product? I tried replacing the one in its installation folder and also in the %APP.DATA% one with no success. It still says I have 40 some days from the trial.
